main event: Mr. and Mrs. ██████ witnessed a pencil-shaped object flying high in the sky above Danville, Kentucky, on 9 January 1948.
interesting points: The object left a long trail of smoke or exhaust,The object exploded into a beautiful fireworks display of sparks after traveling a straight course,The observation was reported in a WHIO news broadcast shortly after the event,The event is classified as 'UNCLASSIFIED' indicating no sensitive information,The specific speed, distance, and color of the object were not provided but experts suggested it resembled a fireball.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. ██████, traveling in their car
